Synthesis_Conditions.Temperature: Room temperature for crystal formation, 70°C for activation under vacuum for 1 hour
Synthesis_Conditions.Method: Methanolic solution of Cd(ClO4)2 added to a stirred solution of ligand in CHCl3, filtered after stirring for few minutes, and kept for slow evaporation.

Synthesis_Conditions.Temperature: Room temperature for crystal formation, 70°C for activation under vacuum for 1 hour
Synthesis_Conditions.Method: Methanolic solution of M(NO3)2 mixed with (NH4)2PF6 in 1:1 ratio, followed by similar procedure as Complex 1.

Synthesis_Conditions.Temperature: Room temperature for crystal formation, 70°C for activation under vacuum for 1 hour
Synthesis_Conditions.Method: Similar to Complex 1, using Zn(ClO4)2 instead of Cd(ClO4)2.

Synthesis_Conditions.Temperature: Room temperature for crystal formation, 70°C for activation under vacuum for 1 hour
Synthesis_Conditions.Method: Similar to Complex 2, using Zn(NO3)2 instead of Cd(NO3)2.

Synthesis_Conditions.Temperature: Room temperature for crystal formation, 70°C for activation under vacuum for 1 hour
Synthesis_Conditions.Method: Cd(ClO4)2 and Zn(ClO4)2 taken in 1:1.5 ratio with ligand in the same reaction flask, followed by similar procedure as Complex 1.

Synthesis_Conditions.Temperature: Room temperature for crystal formation, 70°C for activation under vacuum for 1 hour
Synthesis_Conditions.Method: Cd(ClO4)2 and Zn(ClO4)2 taken in 1:2.5 ratio with ligand in the same reaction flask, followed by similar procedure as Complex 1.
